Type.BattleDialog: Reindeer, let’s sweep them down with haste.
They don’t look like an easy opponent. Keep it together, all.
We didn’t need the help of the other teams.
I’ll say that you did a good job, for courtesy’s sake.
…Not yet… The job isn’t done yet…
We’d better use more caution.
It’s starting to look dangerous… My mind isn’t quite stable.
It’s all a matter of mental prowess…
I guess you weren’t quite enough to stop us, eh?
Reindeer. We’re getting there.
Hurry it up! We’ll be at a disadvantage if this goes on for too long.
Another day, another mission. Let’s do this, everybody.
This came outta nowhere…
We don’t have many options. We do this, or we get stamped out together.
Well, everything else we’ve done was for our survival, too.
Let’s end this quickly.
Could’ve gone bad if it went on for a minute longer.
We aren’t going to get destroyed, right…?
Dunno. The higher ups will handle it.
Shall we head back now, Rudolph, sir?
I underestimated them…
Let’s hope the other teams will win…
We didn’t have intel… Had we studied them more…
This place is full of monsters…
Got to hold out… We’ve got to endure this.
This was… not within my expectation…
I know I shouldn’t get nervous…
Such power… I’d only seen it in the depths.
A good weapon is useless in the wrong hands.
I have no problems yet, so I’ll keep going for now.
…It’s getting harder to endure. Must end it fast…
Looks like the others are starting to get tired.
Whether you live or die here is entirely up to you!
Right now, rampaging is our mission!
Save your thoughts for after you’ve taken ‘em down!
That was easier than dealing with the stuff in the Ruins!
Weren’t so tough after all!
How could I lose… I didn’t even get to go wild…
How many do we have left?
Looks like we’ve met some tricky opponent.
Damn! That one got trampled real bad.
Techniques don’t mean shit against overwhelming power!
Charge ahead, and the path will open up!
Go alone like the rhino’s horn!
Be bold and brash! Be brave!
Whoever the foe might be, they’ll be crushed under the Rhinos’ feet!
Who wants to get pinned first?!
Nothing can stand in the way of a rhinoceros!
Cap’n. Do we start right away?
We’ve won!
Thought you could win? Too bad!
That should spare us from the destruction for a while.
It was good to fight worthy opponents for the first time in a while!
This won’t be enough to best us…!
…Guh… Must stand…!
I won’t go down like this…!
Shoot… They got us instead…
That could’ve knocked me out if it hit me.
I’m used to seeing it!
I just hope it doesn’t lead to the extinction of our Pack!
I won’t mind it! I’ve got work to do!
That’s a frail body you’ve got!
Your attacks are useless!
I’m not done with you yet!
You got in my way… How foolish! Haha!
Hippity hop~! The Rabbits have come to graze the grass!
Just leave it to the Rabbits!
We’re ready to go anywhere the grass is!
Thank you for the meal, it was satisfying.
Phew~ That was tiring. Shall we get back now?
Khrf… Haha… I let my guard down…
Another Rabbit returned to the grasslands.
This place is just as dangerous as before.
An expedition to the Outskirts might’ve been more fun.
There’s still a lot of grass left to munch on!
DIE! Hahah! That was nothing.
The creatures in the beyond would be tougher than this!
Still being a puppet for that machine lady?
My younger self wouldn’t have guessed this is what’s become of my hero.
Yeah. The past is in the past.
…You aren’t half bad.
Cock up your ears, Rabbits.
…We’ll do this as usual.
Another Rabbit returned to the grasslands.
You’re working for THE Red Mist… You should be stronger than that.
I haven’t been idling around all these years.
Let’s show ‘em how strong the Rabbits are.
Remember what you said? It’s the survivors who are strong.
Shoulda realized that the situation is different now.
You’re still as talkative as ever. Are you done speaking?
How you think of me is none of my business.
…I hope I won’t see you again.
Dammit… …But I’ll have to accept it.
Trust in yourselves. We can take down those Rabbits.
Don’t panic. This isn’t over yet.
You don’t want their sacrifice to be in vain, yeah?
There’s no reason we can’t win. Stay calm, all.
Many things have changed, but the spirit has only grown stronger.
You’re still as sloppy as I remember.
Gotta gnaw on ‘em until nothing’s left!
The Rabbits have come to graze the grass.
Ready to enjoy a tasty meal?
Man! Hope there’s enough grass to graze.
Firepower is what wins battles!
Haha! It’s been a while since I fought like this.
What, we’re already outta grazzy grass to chew on?
Ahaha… We’re really gonna die…
You think the Rabbits can handle this alone?
We’re all gonna die…
This mission was doomed to fail…
How unlucky you must be.
This place is nuts!
Maybe we underestimated you bunch?
Things are starting to seem unsafe, huh.
Even a Star of the City is nothing more than grass for the Rabbits to eat.
That’s one less blade of grass left to graze.
Guess we’ve found a decent spot to dine at, huh?
I can go for more! Shall we speed it up?
You’re making too much noise. Shut up and focus.
Rabbits. We’re here to earn a chance to live, so try to make it count, alright?
Be serious if you don’t want to end up dead.
I have much to report when I get back…
Next time we meet… I won’t go down so easily.
Understand that we cannot afford to be distracted.
…Rabbits, stay sharp.
The preparation is nearly complete… Hang in there.
Stay on guard!
They were trifling foes.
It wasn’t the easiest, but your skills were still laughable.
Few of them remain.
I can clearly see you being confused.
…Myo, is that someone you know?
